Package edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.controller

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameStatusObserver
    This observer is called when a response is received from a request to the server to check game status.
    SimpleListObserver
    Notified when a list changes
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractRequirementController
    Abstract requirement controller to be extended by other classes that need to receive requirements
    AbstractUserController
    An abstract class for classes requesting users from the server.
    AddDeckController
    This controller responds when the user clicks the Create Deck button by storing new deck to remote server's database.
    AddDeckRequestObserver
    This observer is called when a response is received from a request to the server to add a deck.
    AddGameController
    This controller responds when the user clicks the Create Game button by storing new game to remote server's database.
    AddGameRequestObserver
    This observer is called when a response is received from a request to the server to add a game.
    CurrentUserController
    This controller responds to request currently logged-in user from the server.
    EmailController
    This controller responds when a game is started or ended by sending email notifications
    EmailSenderThread
    A class for handling email sending to users.
    GameTimeoutObserver
    Used to notify all clients at once that a game has ended.
    GetDecksController
    This controller is used to get decks from server
    GetDecksRequestObserver
    This observer is called when a response is received from a request to the server to get decks.
    GetGamesController
    This controller responds by sending request to get games from remote server.
    GetGamesRequestObserver
    This observer is called when a response is received from a request to the server to get games.
    GetParentRequirementController
    This controller is used to get the parent requirement for a GameRequirementModel
    GetRequirementsController
    This handles requests for game requirements
    GetRequirementsRequestObserver
    This handles all requests for requirements
    NewGameTutorialController
    Guides the user through the process of creating and starting a new game
    RequirementRequestThread
    This is a thread that handles making a request for requirements.
    UpdateGamesController
    Controller for updating games
    UpdateGamesRequestObserver
    This observer is called when a response is received from a request to the server to update games.
    UserRequestObserver
    This class waits for response from the server based on the request sent by its UserController
    UserRequestThread
    A class for requesting users from the server.
    UserUpdateController
    A controller for allowing the current user to change personal preferences.
    ViewController
    This controller is used to control GUI display
